website_summaries.verdict: The Plantronics BackBeat 500 offer surprisingly good audio quality for sub-$100 Bluetooth headphones.
pros: Crisp high-mids and highs with full low-mids
Includes carrying pouch and 3.5mm cable for passive listening

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: They look very fancy and are solidly built. I'm a big fan of the grey and luminous green, but perhaps not a colour scheme with universal appeal. They came almost fully charged and paired easily. Very comfortable to wear and the sound quality is brilliant. Can't really ask for more for the £22 or so I paid for them from a 3rd party seller.
customer_reviews.author: S.O.Henderscrot

customer_reviews.title: This was the option listed as cheap And used.
customer_reviews.text: These phones are brilliant and they linked immediately with my iPad. The price I paid has to be the biggest steal of the century even though it only came ina plain brown box without the paraphernalia the whole experience was totally intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: B. Zabavnik

customer_reviews.title: Less than half the price of a pair of Beats!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Delivered ready charged. Bluetooth sync to iPhone fast with no problems. Good build quality too. Less than half the price of a pair of Beats!!!
customer_reviews.author: Graham H

customer_reviews.title: Quality budget wireless headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Quality wireless headphones, battery lasts quite awhile and sound is excellent, I use these regularly for the gym and have had no issues using them for any exercise, even running. These are fairly sweatproof and can be wiped down easily. There is passive noise cancellation and its decent enough when volume is up high
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t stay connected to my phone and when it was connected the music quality wasn’t that great I know it’s not a very expensive product but I would expect better than what it delivered
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cool.
customer_reviews.text: Small, light and durable but not too warm when exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I was slightly disappointed with the bass at first. I then moved them ever so slightly, so that the surface area makes a fuller air vacuum around my ear - and voila. Simply incredible sound. Noise cancelling, light, and comfy. Don't get hit by a bus by accident!
customer_reviews.author: OJ

customer_reviews.title: very good and light weight headphone
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good except my ears. I like it very much but my ears are sensitive to on the ear so it gets hot after a while. That's expected. The musical tone is surprisingly good for this price.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: while it is not noise cancelling, the sound quality is really good, a step up from a Phillips headphone I was using before!
customer_reviews.author: YYS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, what I would expect from Plantronics
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, what I would expect from Plantronics. Attractive design. Pairing very simple, battery life seems quite good. All switches feel solid and work well. Play, pause, etc. controls on the left earpiece easy to operate. Sound quality is a purely subjective thing so I can only address my personal opinion on this subject. I really like that fact that these earphones are not "bass" heavy. A very clean and natural / neutral sound. Highs are crisp, nothing in the audible range is muddled. I use for both music and spoken word audio and I am very pleased with how both sound.
customer_reviews.author: paulg

customer_reviews.title: Great for price!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Backseat 500 for about 6 weeks now. With them paired up with my Samsung S7 Active most of the time. Besides listening to music we have used them when watching Direct tv live and movies and also the Indy 500 while at the speedway. We are wearing them at the pool right now and plan to give them a workout at the beach next week. These are comfortable so no more ear buds for me
customer_reviews.author: NewAgent45

customer_reviews.title: Well, this set works well for a few months ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, this set works well for a few months until recently I noticed it's losing grip when wearing on it. I though I did not adjust it correctly, but it's not. I found the arch plastic is losing its elasticity and has a clear sign that it will break into two pieces soon. Seems the material is cheap and not strong enough. I'm telling ya I did not force it or break it, it is just the result of normal use. Well, did not want to buy a $300.00 set, now what? Do they honor their warranty? It is just 4 months old.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Looks and worked great, until they broke.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I felt like I should spend a little more to get a nicer set of headphones for my work desk. The fit and finish is excellent, the sounds quality is good, and the bluetooth works great. Sadly, after a year of daily use, sitting at my desk, the plastic band that acts as the main support broke. I have not abused these in anyway. But apparently the stress of putting them over my ears was to much for for that part. I'm very dissapointed. I have purchased cheaper headphone that have lasted longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery Problems
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and right away I had issues keeping them charged. No matter what cable I used, what power brick I used...they would not charge. The red light would come on like they were charging but the percentage wouldn't go up. I sent in the first pair for RMA and they sent me a brand new set, no questions asked. Alas...same problem. I plugged them in last night to charge since they were down to 50% and when I came back into the office this morning, they were at 40%. Do not buy these headphones, they clearly have battery/charging port issues...yet they continue to sell them.
customer_reviews.author: Jem'ma

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They synced up with my phone and iPod easily. They fit well and keep my ears warm on my cold Washington walks. So far I am still working on my first charge, so the battery life is way better than my old headphones. They are not noise cancelling, but that is an advantage because I wear them when I walk my dog and I can hear cars coming when I am on the road. I am really enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Humphries

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Physically well constructed. Aurally great in my opinion (but I use them for listening to talk radio and music recorded on my laptop). Ergonomically easily to use. Comfy on my ears. Paired incredibly easily with my 2008 Lenovo X61 Core II Duo running Windows 10. I bought the Square Trade 3-year protection plan because they are electronics (which I have never done before but considered wise in this instance).
customer_reviews.author: E350

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for phone
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunate, it's not clear in the description, but these are not suitable for phone calls. People were having difficulty hearing me on the phone, so I called Plantronics and was told that these are designed specifically for "media, music and sports", not telephone.
customer_reviews.author: R. P. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: For 80$ these are great entry level wireless headphones. They have really great sound, clear sound all around. Bass is just enough for me, im not a major bass head. They fit comfortably and look nice (black). Only thing i wish is that top level volum was louder but these sound great even at high level volume. I recommend them to anyone who wants a good sounding headphones and doesn't want to break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: MABrAgE

customer_reviews.title: These headphones sound good but I don't recommend them for fat headed people
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound good but I don't recommend them for fat headed people. I had them for about a 2 months when I went to put them on and they snapped right in the middle, technically they still work but fall off of my over sized head if I move at all.
customer_reviews.author: D S

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are truly excellent. They run for close to a day without needing to be recharged and even if they do need to be recharged, you can just plug them in and continue to use them while they are being recharged. The sound is good and they are quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jack J. Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these headphones for both of my kids. The first one worked so well that we went ahead and got a second one. They seem very sturdy and charge relatively quickly. If battery goes out you can use the cord to listen to the music
customer_reviews.author: peter henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones - Delicate mid-grade plastic:(
customer_reviews.text: These were great! Super comfortable but secure. Love the button feel and placement. Ease of use was super great. I am not hard on my headphones. They live on a cointer or my head. Middle cracked after about a year of having them. Bummed cause they were great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: scott j simonsen

customer_reviews.title: Fragile headband
customer_reviews.text: I've had this headset for a little under a year, the sound quality, battery life, and connection range are all very good however I've got one major gripe. I wear the set for a total of about an hour and a half 5 days a week, to and from work, and in breaks. In such a short time the main band has begun to split in two and the padding on the band stated to fall off months ago. I love the durability of Plantronics headsets as far as their PC Headsets are concerned, however if you're looking for that durability in this product then look elsewhere, especilly at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound for my stored music and fine for listening ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound for my stored music and fine for listening to audiobooks. The year cups are a bit uncomfortable and the expansion of the headset is insufficient for larger heads.
customer_reviews.author: Donald H. Heller

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: Plantronics headphones are hard to beat. They are comfortable, well made and easy to setup. I have bought several models and they all work great. Also, good value.
customer_reviews.author: Dmanning

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound quality but little else
customer_reviews.text: Pros: decent sound quality, fairly compact, okay price. Cons: uncomfortable after awhile, microphone doesn't work very well/at all, buttons didn't work on my phone. All in all, it was okay but nothing great. I wouldn't buy it again but would consider Plantronics in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this device for maybe a little over a year. I do not use them often, they spend most of their time sitting on my desk at work. The protective liner on the under side has fallen off. The frame for these headphones has cracked in the middle on top. I do not work out with these headphones on or perform any strenuous activities while using them. Disappointed that they have fallen apart after very limited use.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Osborn

customer_reviews.title: The sound is very good and it's comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very good and it's comfortable. However, the bluetooth connection is a little unstable. I have a macbook pro. When the headphone is turned on and connected with my mac, sometimes it experiences lag and loses base, I have to turn off and on my mac's bluetooth and reconnect with the headphone to get a stable bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: derek99401

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I tried these for an afternoon and while the sound quality was good, the fit was just too uncomfortable. The problem is that the earcups can't fully pivot enough to sit flat on sides of my head. Instead, the bottom edge of each earcup is angled inward applying all the tension to that one spot. If they could pivot more, I think these would be perfect for me, but as it is I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristofer Zarling

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones For the Price
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have great sound and exceptional battery life for the price. These are "on ear" phones and I wear glasses, but I can adjust the soft ear pads to make my listening experience comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones Ive ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: These are, hands down, the best headphones I've ever owned. The battery on life on these is fantastic. I use them every day and typically only have to recharge em every 7-10 days. I have a big ol' moonhead, and these accommodate that well without sacrificing in terms of comfort too. They stay in place too, they're not the type that you have to worry about a stiff breeze displacing them. The earcups are a nice soft leather that feel great on the ears too.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery?
customer_reviews.text: They sound great, yet I’ve been charging them for 12+ hours and they’ve yet to gain any battery life. I also tried a day before for 6 and the same thing happened. Very disappointed with this and am seeking a refund or new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: the battery power is pretty strong and the headphones are cute
customer_reviews.text: So I switched to this brand from Beats and the first thing I noticed was the quality of the sound wasn’t what I expected. The headphones don’t fold up so it’s hard to store them. Besides that, the battery power is pretty strong and the headphones are cute. For the price though I wouldn’t recommend it...honestly he best headphones seem to be the most expensive ones and if you’re particular about the sound like I am then invest in a good pair
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: The product isn't all that bad in terms of sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The product isn't all that bad in terms of sound quality, comfort, and even noise cancellation. However, none of that matters if the right ear develops a tinny sound after a week and a half of use. I experianced connection problems as well with this headset. Already requested a retun and shipped it out.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Weier

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the sound quality is really really good especially for this price. As good, if not better than many other more expensive headsets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very small.  Not good for big heads
customer_reviews.text: Shockingly small headphones. They do not fit my big head. Product quality seemed very nice but can't comment on audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: C Fizzle

customer_reviews.title: these have great presence and balance of sound for this price point
customer_reviews.text: Aside from some stutters with pairing, these have great presence and balance of sound for this price point, though they don’t get particularly loud if you like to blast it (true for most rechargeable headphones, due to battery life I suppose). Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Eilers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the $$
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this headset and I also previously owned the Jabra Move. For the price, this headset sounds great and the battery life is a big plus. It's really not in the league sound-wise with Beats or Bose. The Jabra seems to be a higher quality build, but I like the fact that the BackBeat 500's earcups rotate for storage purposes. Don't get excited about the included pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones. I have had them for about 3 months. I took them out of the box, they paired immediately to my phone and tablet. The headphones have been around my neck or on my head every day since.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: It worked pretty well for a few months
customer_reviews.text: It worked pretty well for a few months. Then the bluetooth randomly crapped out. They still worked as wired headphones but then that broke too when I got the wire caught in a door handle. It was good while it lasted but these headphones can't handle any wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: D to the B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great. I'm so pleased the sound quality and that they are light weight. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Diva*3*

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These would get 5 stars for quality and ease of use except for the fact that I've only had them for 4 months and the headband is broken just from normal wear. Because it's padded, I'm not sure what it's made from, but if it can't last 4 months it can't be very sturdy. Don't buy these unless you want to have to replace them
customer_reviews.author: Laura Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: returning
customer_reviews.text: not very loud. Hurt my ears after a while because of the way they sit. The microphone worked very well. They are nor really worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Gossett

customer_reviews.title: Won’t charge; bad for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I thought thus was a great set of headphones...until they stopped charging. The sound quality was good while it lasted but dying after 9 months...meh. I doubt I’d get another plantronics product after this.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Holds battery!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had to charge these headphones one time and have gone several weeks using them about an hour at a time 4-5 days a week and not needed to charge best purchase and great performance plus they're super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Average Sound Quality, Crappy Durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in May 2018, now in September the plastic along the top is already cracking and I expect it to fully snap any day. Unless your head is a mere 2-3 inches wide, these will most likely do the same to you. Sound quality is meh. Songs with a lot of bass sounded hollow and weak. Would not buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeralyn C. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Battery great, poor quality foam/fitting
customer_reviews.text: Battery life on these is great but everything else is terrible. From the picture you can see that the foam cover is peeling-even though I’ve taken special care of them. Fits really tight over the ears too but can deal with that. Not a quality product for the price. I’ll shop for a new pair elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: E-sez

customer_reviews.title: They look nice enough, but the audio quality is pretty atrocious
customer_reviews.text: They look nice enough, but the audio quality is pretty atrocious. If you are primarily using this for music i'd pass. If you are using it for chatting it would be ok.
customer_reviews.author: gltovar

customer_reviews.title: Bad echo when using as a phone headset
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good, and this is great for listening to music, however it is virtually unusable for use as for talking on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nicholas Hawley

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: good, but i don't really use the bluetooth - the bluetooth skips consistently. wired works fine
customer_reviews.author: RobC

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good tonal qualities across the range as long as it is not too loud. Comfort is average. Ability to connect to 2 devices simultaneously and connect via cable when battery is flat are two useful features. Overall, it's good value for the price I paid. I subsequently bought the Plantronic Fit 300 earphone for my workout and am very pleased with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Cheong

customer_reviews.title: The cushion on the headphone fell off
customer_reviews.text: The cushion on the headphones fell off on the third day with 2 hours of using in total. I'M very disappointed having spent my money on something that lasted three days. I don't reccomend this product to someone who wants a good pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Wadhwa

customer_reviews.title: Good looking product
customer_reviews.text: Good looking product, excelent quality sound compare with my old creative 450, i.m not yet get use to switch between two bluetooth devices but i will. UPDATE: Bad quality of the materials, after some months of normal use the synthetic leather begin to rip off and the plastic too i got to dump it and buy new ones of course not the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Franky

customer_reviews.title: Best for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: It was the best choice for the money. It has enough sound while working out at the gym. You get a great wireless headset yet you ain’t paying JBL or Beats prices
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter hasn't taken them off since she opened the gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I bought them for my teenage son, and he is very particular about headphones. He loves them, good sound quality, and nicely styled.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Allen

customer_reviews.title: they charged up very fast
customer_reviews.text: These are very good headphones this is my second pair the battery life is very good and the quality is amazing I definitely recommend them for anybody who wants to use them for working out or just everyday use
customer_reviews.author: juan duran

customer_reviews.title: Very poor long-term battery life
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these headphones for about 5 months. In the beginning, the wireless charge would last for about three days, which I was satisfied with. Now, though, I’ll plug them in to charge overnight and the battery will only last an hour or so. Very disappointed- wish I could return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound is amazing. Extremely long battery.
customer_reviews.text: The headset seems a little tight around my ears but quickly I got used to it. The sound is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Steinberg

customer_reviews.title: Very light headphones for workout.
customer_reviews.text: About durability I will post after 8 months of use. For the moment I used them 5 days a week for almost a month and the are like new. You can connect at the same time two sources and is reliable very fast.
customer_reviews.author: ILIAS YANNIOU

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good but not a durable option
customer_reviews.text: Never thought that it can tear a part from it’s headband. I purchased them by following the brand name but their build quality is disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Arslan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable. They stick kind of far out from my head. Pairing super simple and great sound quality. I enjoy the microphone. The mic seems to work best worth phone calling rather than video chats like hangouts.
customer_reviews.author: Brenton James Colton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality device for price! Earpad is little bit small to me. Much care is necessary in purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ㅐ7ㅐAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Audio quality is great. Been using it for mostly audio books while ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Audio quality is great. Been using it for mostly audio books while riding the train to work
customer_reviews.author: Man Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these a week after purchase because the bluetooth stopped working and one of the ear pieces started coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: A bit small and tight, but otherwise great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: A bit small, those with a larger head beware. Good sound and comfort otherwise. Long battery life and pretty reliable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: mehh
customer_reviews.text: Ehh not the sound i was expecting its great for the wireless and range no cut offs but their is hardley any bass at all and not as loud as the regular $17 plantronic headsets which sound way better and louder overall everything works great but not for an average music listener
customer_reviews.author: Imethodzz

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Even when I forget to turn them off, the battery lasts for around 2 days
customer_reviews.author: Maria Castellano

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I watched a movie and noticed there was a short delay between the action and the sound. Switching back and forth from normal speakers to headphones I verified the delay was only heard through the headphones. It was very distracting. The sound quality wasn't very good either. It was like listening through a cardboard tube. I returned the headphones the next day. Good news is I got a prompt refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: block some of the noise but not all. good head phone for the dollars
customer_reviews.text: they block some of the noise but not all. I like them very much and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great First Time Wireless Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT headphones! They are my first wireless and I read reviews from many electronic sites and opted to go with Plantronics and don't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and I use these to mix audio at the church I serve at. The best budget headphone out there.
customer_reviews.author: Clay McClendon

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected for the price. Nothing else to add.
customer_reviews.author: Narohodo

customer_reviews.title: Headphone is lightweight and good for my active lifestyle and i feel comfortable wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is quite exceptional, the balance and clarity coupled with the deep bass is very well tuned. Headphone is lightweight and good for my active lifestyle and i feel comfortable wearing it for hours.Its worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Howard R.

customer_reviews.title: SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: It will not connect with any of my devices. Have tried multiple devices and OS and will not work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but a bit tight for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but a bit tight for me, probably because it is still new. Connects to phone and Alexa easily
customer_reviews.author: Dan Bourke

customer_reviews.title: I really like them, I wish the ear peace was larger ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like them, I wish the ear peace was larger to go over my ears. They set on my ears and my ears began to hurt after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: goodwife2

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend loves them. Can't comment on longevity since ...
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves them. Can't comment on longevity since it's only been a couple of weeks. She loves how they look, the sound quality, and battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality, good battery life, firm grip to head. Only minor issue is too load announcement of low battery.
customer_reviews.author: Alexey Karimov

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy build, great sound
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Sturdy build, great sound, good looks and great battery live. I have yet to charge it after 5 days of use. Microphone also works well with my Samsung s7.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck & good for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I use them mainly for the gym. Good sound, solid feel, long range and good battery.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Reliable connection and clear sound. Great battery life as well
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good and got better with use
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate being greeted by "Eloise" informing me that the system is on/off and giving the battery strength. Sound quality is good and got better with use.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Parker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound and very powerful mic! I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: 81660 Ivan Nikolov

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Most reviews around the internet seem to agree that these are some of the best wireless headphones you can buy for ~$80. Now that I finally got my hands on a pair, I can add one more positive review to the list. These are light, comfortable, stylish (subjective), and have a very nice sound overall. The bass can be a little... "dramatic" with electronic music and such, so much that you can actually feel the headphones vibrating on your head at high volume - not necessarily a negative in my book 😂. tl;dr all around great set of phones. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones but......
customer_reviews.text: Just received today. Haven't actually listened to them yet but one of my impressions right out of the box is not great. While the headphones themselves appear to be of good quality, there was a lot of paperwork that came in the box yet not a single piece gives any instructions on how to use or setup (other than a very brief "quick start" guide) The reason there is so much paperwork is that its printed in 32 different languages.....REALLY???? and none of it is information that's remotely helpful. Safety and Declaration of Conformity, FCC Regulatory Information, etc. Hey Plantronics.....why don't you provide some paperwork that's helpful.....like a USERS MANUAL!!
customer_reviews.author: PDawg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice head phones for $80. Good sound and overall a nice experience. Would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gawlik

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: great headsets with great rich sound. the weight is abit heavy but feel stable enough on the head.
customer_reviews.author: amir

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, light weight and up to 28 hours of battery. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lee

customer_reviews.title: Average and overly pricey
customer_reviews.text: I have a planteonics running ear phone and I like it so I tried its headphone ... But sound, fit......pretty much average and u can get any headphone of that quality at half of the price. I would not recomend buying it at this price at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Chun

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Pros/Cons
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! These headphones are by far my current favorite. Pros - sleek design - comfortable on ears - very durable - great sound - comes with aux cord if needed - buttons on side make for easy play/pause - battery life Cons - doesn't collapse well for travel - wind drag is prominent on a bike
customer_reviews.author: N G

customer_reviews.title: All over good headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have this headphones 🎧 fir awhile now . I bought it for trip to Louisiana , first I wasn't very impressed with the sound 🔊 quality but as I wore em on my ears for awhile I started falling love with them , it doesn't bother my ear even though if wear em for hours. Sound quality is good , not too much goes through your ear just quality music 🎶
customer_reviews.author: Gavie

customer_reviews.title: Weak plastic band
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in August '17. Now, April 2 '18. I take really good care of everything - and these are no exception. However this morning I noticed that they just aren't fitting quite right.. upon inspection, I noticed that the band has cracked/split right at the top. So now they have a hinge point on the top and that digs into my head and they also do not fit as snug. Great sound - just poor quality in that one area.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them, but still on the fence about the microphone and taking calls with them. I love my other Plantronics headsets. For the price, they are an awesome value. I love the green/grey color.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica in CO

customer_reviews.title: so these satisfy and seem worth the price to me
customer_reviews.text: Not picky about sound, so these satisfy and seem worth the price to me. The only drawback is my ears feel a bit achey and squished after prolonged wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Wreater

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have gotten me through some rough days at work. Volume works great great sound and very comfortable adjustable fit. Connects easily to my note 8
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Brown

customer_reviews.title: Completely lacking bass, thin sound.
customer_reviews.text: No bass at all, sound was poor. I returned right away. I am not a bass head at all either, they do not faithfully reproduce any kind of music.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R. Sievers

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality but crippling issues.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is outstanding, the phone is downy and it's battery lasts more than 18 hours. Regardless of all those good things I'm experiencing some problems with my BackBeat 500: I cannot use it to answear my calls nor use it's microphone on any app, and the buttons that should be used to control the music flow (pause/play, skip) doesn't work on my phone, that makes me very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ícaro

customer_reviews.title: Just got it - no matter how I adjust it ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got it - no matter how I adjust it, headphones squeeze my head (7 3/4 hat size) and gives me a headache within a couple of minuts. Will try it for the day before returning it
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Cant sit to close to my cell phone
customer_reviews.text: they look good, and fit my tiny head and have a pretty decent range, but I will probably return them. I get cell interference at work that makes voices sound robotic and my white noise sound patchy.
customer_reviews.author: mutt mom

product_meta.title: Plantronics BackBeat 500 Wireless Bluetooth Headphones - Lightweight Memory Foam Headband and Earcups - Compatible with iPhone, iPad, Android, and Other Smart Devices - Grey
product_meta.description: Color:GreyLose the cords with BackBeat 500 wireless headphones. Whether you’re racing to class or sitting in a packed coffee shop, up to 18 hours of power on a single charge lets you listen more and charge less. Don't just hear your favorite tracks, feel them. Deep, rich sound and powerful bass bring music to life. And when your days are long, your headphones won’t weigh you down. Wear them comfortably on your ears or around your neck for hours, thanks to a lightweight design and soft memory foam ear cushions that rotate to lay flat. BackBeat 500-experience wireless.
feature_bullets: LONG LASTING BATTERY LIFE: Rechargeable battery lets you listen more with up to 18 hours of wireless listening time on a single charge
COMFORT: Lightweight, memory foam headband and earcups provide comfort and sound isolation so you can enjoy music, movies and calls without weighing you down
HIGH QUALITY AUDIO: 40 mm drivers and advanced acoustic technology deliver the right audio balance and a deep, rich sound through extremely comfortable headphones
CONNECTIVITY: Take calls with a wideband-enabled mic that lets you access Siri, Google Now, or Cortana right from your headphones

BLUETOOTH COMPATIBLE: Plantronics Bluetooth headsets and headphones are universally compatible with supported Bluetooth devices. To pair a Plantronics headset or headphone with a Windows, Android, or IOS device, it must support Bluetooth audio streaming and telephony profiles (A2DP for media streaming and HSP or HFP for calls)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars294 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
